data.name: Tag Royale
data.detailed_description:
Why I made this game:
I made this game for everyone to enjoy playing a classic game together with a twist. Can you be the last one to survive and not be tagged?

What this game expresses:
I want Tag Royal to help build friendships and make new ones. I wanted to go back to basics and do what makes making games fun and that's for everyone to enjoy my game.

Content:
Play up to 100 players and be the last one tagged.

Overview of the gameplay:
Use powers to outrun, out-smart and out maneuver your opponent. A classic game of tag but on a huge scale. If you are picked as being IT don't worry you will get a fighting chance by being respawned back as a not it.

Why I made this game:

data.short_description: A classic game of Tag with a battle royale twist. Everyone is your friend until they are IT. I hope you enjoy the views but be worried about those who are around you. They may betray you while using a power-up that can tag you and eliminate you from the game
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 +
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 +
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida Geforce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
